title: CLEMENCE, 7.50 CARAT 15 STONE STRAND NECKLACE, GOLD

details:

Setting: Bezel set

Stone Shape: Round cut

This necklace includes a loop to adjust the necklace shorter by 1 inch. If you purchase the 16-inch, this includes 15 inches + a 1-inch extension. If you purchase the 17-inch, this includes 16 inches + a 1-inch extension.
